price: 111. Kaxxa mari firqawnal gacisak: kaa kee kay toobokoytih caagid wadirroysaay, magaalooluk baababa koh gaabossa labha Rub kaak iyyen.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-arsil fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
